Name: Boxing Queen
About the game: This is a special boxing game. The player controls the beautiful heroine to enter the boxing match. Welcome to the underground world of women's boxing. The women here have angelic faces and hot bodies, but don't be fooled by them, they don't pull any punches in the ring. Players will participate in this different boxing world through the mode of challenge. · 3D perspective, third person, any perspective to enjoy the wonderful moments of female boxers fighting. · Real simulation of various boxing punches, blocks, dodging and steps. · Smooth feeling of fighting, The female boxer's action of being hit is real and pitiful. · Interesting boxing strategy, players need to guess the opponent's next move, perfect interpretation of the attack and defense art of boxing. · Physical strength control system is no longer a thoughtless attack, but a reasonable allocation of physical strength.
